instruction: Given a list of sounds, describe how each sound is produced.
output:
Laughter is produced through the stimulating of the diaphragm and other respiratory muscles contracting and releasing air, while vocal cords and other vocal organs help in producing different tones.
Barking is produced through the vocal cords located in the larynx vibrating against the throat and lungs releasing air, while the higher or lower pitch of the bark is determined by the pressure of the air.

instruction: Given two strings, write a program to determine if they are palindromes.
Categorize the movie genre.
output: Drama.

instruction: Given two stimuli, suggest a topic for discussion.
output: The effect of cell phones and social media on the modern family dynamic.

instruction: Identify any biases in a given statement.
input: Women are not suited for engineering jobs.
output: Gender bias - women are as capable as men in engineering jobs.

instruction: Divide a given set of items into categories.
output:
Dairy: Butter, Eggs, Cheese 
Beverage: Orange juice

instruction: Given a movie description, classify the genre.
input: A science fiction adventure story set in a distant future
output: Science Fiction.

instruction: Design a t-shirt with the annoucement of a new product.
output: An image of a smartphone in the center of a black t-shirt with the words "Introducing the brand new Smartphone" in bold white lettering around the image.

instruction: Retrieve the last two lines from the given poem.
input:
I wander away in search of a sight
Not seeing any man in the night
output:
Although it is night, I must remain 
Ever in search for a dream.

instruction: Name a type of dish that can be served as a sweet dessert.
output: Tiramisu

instruction: Reverse the order of the given words, keeping the punctuation the same.
output: It was great movie.

instruction: Generate a poem with five lines, each line containing four syllables.
output:
Fields of green, 
Flowers of blue, 
Dawn of a new day, 
Rising up so true. 
Take my hand now, 
Always be here. 
Let the days ahead, 
Fill with love and cheer.

instruction: Given a news article headline, identify the topic it is discussing.
input: A four-year trade war between two global powers ends
output: The topic of this news article is the end of a trade war between two global powers.

instruction: Generate a quantity of type with at least 5 words.
output: Optimism is an optimistic attitude or way of thinking, characterized by hopefulness and the expectation of positive outcomes and confident in the future. It is a mental attitude that works towards believing that everything is going to be alright, no matter what challenges one may face or obstacles one may encounter. Optimism also includes having faith in one's ability to achieve success even in the face of adversity.

instruction: Describe the following photo in at least 5 sentences.
output: This photo shows a street full of brightly-colored colonial style buildings in Charlotte Amalie, St. Thomas. The architecture of the buildings is very distinctive, with a mixture of Caribbean-style roofs and European-style balconies. The colors of the buildings give the street a vibrant, lively atmosphere. The cobblestone street is bustling with pedestrians, cars, and bicycles. The blue sky and white clouds add a peaceful, calming feeling to the landscape. The street is full of life and energy, showing the beauty of the culture and the people here in Charlotte Amalie, St. Thomas.

instruction: Identify the types of conflicts the following passage contains.
input: The two friends had been silent ever since they got into the car, but they both knew they had an important conversation to have.
output: The passage portrays a conflict between the two friends over an important conversation that needs to be had. This is an example of "inner conflict" and "interpersonal conflict".

instruction: Using the following words, create a 5 line poem.
output:
Love is true and laughter never fades,
Believe in what's brave and never be afraid,
The beauty of this world will never cease,
It's through love and laughter that we find peace.
Believe in yourself and always take the lead,
Your strength will keep you ever free.

instruction: Convert the following code snippet into a pseudocode.
output:
WHILE counter is less than limit DO
    PRINT counter
    ADD 5 to counter
END WHILE

instruction: Generate a sentence using the following parts of speech.
output: The butterfly squawked loudly.

instruction: Append the text to make it complete.
output: My friend always has a positive outlook on life.
